structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXV. HOMESTEAD AIR FORCE BASE ZONING

law.catch_line: Division of airport hazard area into zone.

text.section:
Sec. 33-293.2. Division of airport hazard area into zone.
The airport hazard area outside of the government reservation boundary is divided into height limiting zones as follows: approach-departure clearance surface zones, inner horizontal surface zones, outer horizontal surface zones and transitional surface zones.
